## Introduction
and to validate, where possible, PersonAlytics output against SAS (not all models available in PersonAlytics can be fit in SAS)

#### Single Subject Test

```{r, warning=FALSE}
t1palytic <- Palytic$new(data = OvaryICT, ids='Mare', dv='follicles',
                    time='Time', phase='Phase')
t1palytic.mare1 <- t1palytic$lme(t1palytic$data$Mare==1)
summary(t1palytic.mare1)$tTable
```

### Single Subject Test
